programme.title: Hikayat Merong Mahawangsa
programme.desc: Pada tahun 120,Empayar Romketika itu di bawah pemerintahan Hadrian sementara di negara China,Dinasti Hanmerupakan sebuah empayar yang kuat dan telah memperluaskan pemerintahannya ke negara Asia Tengah. Semasa angkatan Rom sedang membaik pulih kapal mereka diGoa, mereka meminta pertolongan Merong Mahawangsa mengiringi Putera Rom ke Langkasuka (dikatakan terletak di utara Malaysia) untuk berkahwin dengan seorang Puteri China yang cantik dari Dinasti Han.

programme.title: Terowong Ep 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Episod 2 bertajuk "Curang" ianya memaparkan Datuk Johan bermimpi diganggu roh seorang perempuan dalam sebuah terowong. Datuk Johan merasa itu petunjuk bahawa isterinya, Sabrina curang dan merancang untuk membunuhnya. Datuk Johan telah meminta Taha menjaga isterinya semasa bercuti di Bali. Datuk Johan mengsyaki isterinya memang ada hubungan sulit dengan Taha selama ini. Datuk Johan telah membuat wasiat baru yang tidak menamakan isterinya mendapat hak sebahagian dari hartanya. Sabrina mendapat maklumat mengenai Datuk melalui peguam syarie dan pada masa yang sama Datuk juga menggunakan Taha untuk mengintip pergerkan isterinya. Datuk Johan bermimpi lagi dia dibunuh oleh isterinya, walau bagaimanapun Datuk telah merancang hendak membunuh isterinya terlebih dahulu. Datuk Johan bersemuka dengan Taha dan isterinya untuk menyelesaikan kemelut yang sedang dihadapinya, namun Datuk Johan telah tertembak Taha dan mati serta merta kerana hendak mempertahankan Sabrina. Sebelum sempat Sabrina menjelaskan hubungan beliau dengan Taha, Sabrina telah mati ditembak oleh Datuk Johan. Datuk Johan telah membuang kedua-dua mayat tersebut di sebuah kawasan belukar. Setelah Datuk Johan pergi ke rumah buruk tersebut barulah beliau mendapat tahu bahawa Sabrina sedang merancang untuk menyambut hari jadinya bersama-sama anak yatim dan akhirnya Datuk Johan mendapat tahu bahawa isterinya adalah orang yang baik. Oleh kerana syak wasangka serta cemburu yang keterlaluan Datuk Johan telah membunuh kedua-dua adik beradik tersebut tanpa usul periksa dan akhirnya Datuk Johan juga meninggal dunia akibat dicekik oleh hantu isterinya

programme.title: Beyond Skyline
programme.desc: Seorang detektif memulakan usaha tanpa henti untuk membebaskan anaknya daripada kapal perang asing yang ngeri.

programme.title: Khun Pan
programme.desc: Cerita ini mengisahkan tentang seorang pegawai polis bernama Khun Phan dalam Perang Dunia Kedua. Dia menjalankan misi penyamaran untuk menumpaskan seorang gabenor di sebuah pulau yang semua orang di sana dianggap penyamun.

programme.title: Angel Has Fallen
programme.desc: Pahlawan Pendita menemui Arjuna di hadapan leftenan Grakus. dengan itu membenarkan Arjuna memaksimumkan keupayaan sebenar dan melawan kuasa-kuasa jahat?

programme.title: Hikayat Merong Mahawangsa
programme.desc: Pada tahun 120,Empayar Romketika itu di bawah pemerintahan Hadrian sementara di negara China,Dinasti Hanmerupakan sebuah empayar yang kuat dan telah memperluaskan pemerintahannya ke negara Asia Tengah. Semasa angkatan Rom sedang membaik pulih kapal mereka diGoa, mereka meminta pertolongan Merong Mahawangsa mengiringi Putera Rom ke Langkasuka (dikatakan terletak di utara Malaysia) untuk berkahwin dengan seorang Puteri China yang cantik dari Dinasti Han.

programme.title: Puaka Balai Gombak
programme.desc: Ramai mempercayai bahawa sesebuah tempat atau lokasi itu dikatakan berpuaka setelah berlaku sesuatu tragedi yang melibatkan kematian atau kawasan yang telah lama ditinggalkan. Alam mistik sering menjadi sebuah topik yang subjektif dan menjadi perbalahan dikalangan masyarakat kerana masing-masing mempunyai perspektif yang berbeza-beza terutama sekali di kalangan ahli-ahli kumpulan paranormal di Malaysia mahupun di luar negara. Antara tempat-tempat yang sering menerima kunjungan kumpulan-kumpulan paranormal tempatan adalah seperti Balai Gombak, Highland Towers, Villa Nabila, Apartment Riviera II, Taman RekreasiMimalanddi Gombak dan banyak lagi.

programme.title: The Living Dead
programme.desc: Rompakan yang kecil menjadi huru-hara, apabila pencuri berakhir di istana lama dan menemui sumpahan purba yang melindungi hartanya. Entiti ghaib secara aktif cuba menghalang mereka daripada mencari emas, atau adakah mereka?

programme.title: Binhi
programme.desc: Daniel dan Cynthia, pasangan muda dengan anak dalam perjalanan, mengalami masa sukar di Manila. Mereka kembali ke Baguio, tempat asal Daniel, untuk memulakan semula. Melalui kebaikan Alex, kawan Daniel zaman kanak-kanak yang kaya, mereka dapat tinggal di sebuah rumah besar, tanpa sewa; dan dia mendapat tawaran kerja juga. Segala-galanya seolah-olah jatuh pada tempatnya untuk mereka - atau begitulah yang mereka fikirkan - sehingga perkara aneh mula berlaku di rumah mereka.

programme.title: Gangster
programme.desc: Berdasarkan geng-geng Bangkok yang terkenal pada tahun 1950-an-60an. Kisah ini mengikuti seorang banduan yang baru dibebaskan yang ingin hidup lurus, tetapi tidak mengetahui apa-apa selain kehidupan seorang samseng, dia kembali kepada kumpulan lamanya.

programme.title: Double Barrel
programme.desc: Mengenai pasangan muda yang miskin bekerja sebagai pembunuh upahan sehingga mereka diberi tugasan terbaru untuk menghapuskan abang isteri sendiri yang memaksa mereka lari dan bersembunyi daripada kumpulan itu untuk menyelamatkan diri dan bayi mereka.

programme.title: Muzium Misteri Ep9
programme.desc: Mengisahkan kali ini Adam, Shah dan Daniel meneruskan misi untuk mengesan lembaga kuali. Sebelum itu dalam diam-diam Shah bertemu janji dengan Nur dan keluar bersiar-siar di bandar. Mereka telah ke rumah sasaran di rumah Mak Jah. Setakat ini dari pengesanan awal tiada lembaga kuali. Dalam pada itu Bad bertanyakan ibu Nur kepada Nur. Setelah tiada sebarang tanda-tanda di kawasan perumahan Mak Jah, lalu mereka tamatkan pemburuan. Akibat ada gangguan baru di kawasan itu mereka meneruskan pengesanan. Kononnya di gerai makan perumahan itu laris akibat saka yang memasak. Kini lembaga kuali gagal memasuki gerai itu lagi sebaliknya berkeliaran di rumah tertentu. Berikutan itu mereka selain dapat nasihat lanjut dari prof. Glem, mereka telah menyiapkan dapur ringkas secara terbuka untuk perancangan mengesan lembaga kuali.

programme.title: Arjuna Ep25
programme.desc: Mengisahkan seorang gadis kampung naif yang datang ke bandar untuk mencari pekerjaan di sebuah pejabat dan di situ dia telah bertemu dengan bekas mat rempit yang telah jatuh cinta pada pandangan pertama. Dia berusaha untuk menolong gadis itu sesuaikan diri dengan gaya hidup bandar dan akhirnya gadis kampung itu juga telah jatuh cinta kepadanya. Walaubagaimanapun kerana sifatnya yang matang, ramai wanita mencemburuinya.

programme.title: Ropes
programme.desc: Ann bersama keluarganya, suami dan anak perempuannya serta ibunya berpindah ke tempat baru dimana mereka berharap untuk hidup lebih baik. Bagaimanapun kehidupan mereka berubah di luar jangkaan apabila perkara pelik mula berlaku di dalam rumah. Ann segera berunding dengan bomoh yang merasakan kejahatan di dalam rumah. Dengan bantuan dari asal tuan tanah, Ann mesti membongkar rahsia ngeri sebelum kejahatan memakan seluruh keluarga.

programme.title: Kuntilanak Ciliwung
programme.desc: Pada suatu hari, Flora yang tertekan kerana ibunya terlalu melindungi, diajak teman lelakinya, Danu, untuk tinggal di rumah kosongnya bersama rakannya Bella dan Marcell. Tetapi pada suatu hari Flora diserang sawan dan mati serta merta selepas api unggun di tepian sungai Ciliwung. Danu dan rakan-rakannya kemudian menanam mayat Flora secara luar biasa. Roh Flora merayau

programme.title: Triangle The Dark Side
programme.desc: Seorang Hitman yang telah bersara terpaksa menyelesaikan misi terakhirnya, tetapi jatuh cinta dengan kakak sasarannya. Kini dia perlu memilih antara Cinta dan Logik.

programme.title: Rough Cut
programme.desc: Seorang samseng yang ingin menjadi pelakon; seorang pelakon yang lebih gangster daripada segala-galanya. Di sini laluan dan kehidupan mereka mula bersilang.

programme.title: Gonjiam: Haunted Asylum
programme.desc: Krew siri web seram pergi ke rumah puaka terbiar untuk siaran langsung. Mereka akan menemui sesuatu lebih daripada yang dijangkakan apabila mereka bergerak lebih dalam ke dalam bangunan lama yang mengerikan itu.

programme.title: The Kill List
programme.desc: Selepas mengetahui siapa yang membunuh ibu bapanya, seorang pembunuh upahan berhasrat untuk membalas dendam berdarah, manakala pada masa yang organisasi dimana dia bekerja berusaha menjejakinya

programme.title: Janin Tak Berdosa
programme.desc: Pasangan suami isteri muda Firman dan Julia merancang berbulan madu di Amsterdam selepas Firman mendapat kenaikan pangkat di syarikatnya. Oleh kerana pada masa itu Julia mengandung dan beliau ingin meneruskan percutiannya maka mereka merancang menggugurkan kandungan itu.

programme.title: Khun Pan 2
programme.desc: Cerita ini mengisahkan tentang seorang pegawai polis bernama Khun Phan dalam Perang Dunia Kedua. Dia menjalankan misi penyamaran untuk menumpaskan seorang gabenor di sebuah pulau yang semua orang di sana dianggap penyamun.

programme.title: Losmen Melati Ep 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Di pinggir Jawa, Indonesia, pengembara dari dekat dan jauh meninjau sesuatu yang aneh dan misteri. sebuah keluarga yang mencari tempat tinggal selepas pengebumian nenek mereka dan pasangan muda bercinta mencari tempat untuk bermalam bersama. Walau bagaimanapun, perkara-perkara tidak seperti yang mereka nampak di losmen

programme.title: Before The Fire
programme.desc: Ketika wabak global melanda Los Angeles, bintang TV yang sedang meningkat naik Ava Boone terpaksa meninggalkan kekacauan yang semakin memuncak dan kembali ke kampung halamannya di luar bandar. Semasa dia bergelut untuk menyesuaikan diri dengan cara hidup yang dia tinggalkan lama dahulu, kepulangannya menarik sosok berbahaya dari masa lalunya, mengancam dia dan keluarga yang menjadi satu-satunya tempat perlindungannya.

programme.title: Laddaland
programme.desc: Apabila sebuah keluarga berpindah ke Laddaland, sebuah pembangunan perumahan mewah dengan rumah yang besar dan cantik, mereka mendapati kehidupan di kawasan kejiranan baharu mereka tidak begitu sempurna apabila mereka menghadapi satu siri peristiwa paranormal yang menakutkan yang mendorong keluarga itu ke pinggir kegilaan.

programme.title: TABU: Mengusik Gerbang Iblis
programme.desc: Mengisahkan sekumpulan 6 orang sahabat muda yang secara tidak sengaja memasuki hutan larangan di Leuweung Hejo. Mereka ialah Diaz, Keyla, Tio , Adis, Muti dan Mahir. Selepas memasuki hutan, mereka menjalankan aktiviti yang dianggap pantang larang.

programme.title: Rumah Pasung
programme.desc: Ryan, Sultan dan Mayang merupakan krew program tv tersebut. Suatu hari Ryan terpaksa menghadiri pengebumian bapa kandungnya. Ibu bapa Ryan membongkar masa lalu Ryan. Ryan anak angkat. Ayah Ryan meninggalkan sebuah rumah untuknya.

programme.title: Muzium Misteri Ep10
programme.desc: Mengisahkan sedang Daniel, Shah dan Adam bersedia di perkarangan perumahan. Tiba-tiba seorang suri rumah bergegas datang melaporkan di dapurnya ada lembaga lilin. Mereka bertiga ke situ, lembaga kuali menyerang mereka, sehingga Daniel jatuh dan cedera dan perlu rawatan di wad. Bad datang memberi sedikit wang sagu hati selain memberi jaminan pihak insuran akan mengurus lanjut. Nur terus melakukan misi untuk bapa dan ibunya berbaik-baik. Kedua pihak kelihatan positif. Sementara itu Shah dan Adam terus memburu lembaga kuali. Setakat ini lembaga kuali muncul dikawasan perumahan itu, tetapi kedua mereka dipermainkan kerana lembaga kuali berkebolehan bergerak dengan cepat dari satu tingkat ke tingkat yang lain lalu menghilangkan diri. Kedua Adam dan Shah tidak putus asa. Suatu hari mereka ternampak lembaga kuali berehat di bahagian taman perumahan itu. Adam dan Shah mengambil kualinyadahulu. Kemudiannya mereka mensasarkan target dan berjaya menyedutnya. Kali ini misi mereka berjaya.Sekali lagi Bad gembira kerana muziumnya dijangka akan dilawati ramai lagi pengunjung.

programme.title: Arjuna Ep26
programme.desc: Mengisahkan seorang gadis kampung naif yang datang ke bandar untuk mencari pekerjaan di sebuah pejabat dan di situ dia telah bertemu dengan bekas mat rempit yang telah jatuh cinta pada pandangan pertama. Dia berusaha untuk menolong gadis itu sesuaikan diri dengan gaya hidup bandar dan akhirnya gadis kampung itu juga telah jatuh cinta kepadanya. Walaubagaimanapun kerana sifatnya yang matang, ramai wanita mencemburuinya.

programme.title: Mantera
programme.desc: Tomok, Faezah,Jayson, Shiqin Kamal

programme.title: Usop Wilcha Meghonjang Makhluk Muzium
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang pihak sebuah muzium yang menganjurkan pameran hantu-hantu dunia dalam usaha menarik orang ramai kembali datang ke muzium. Penganjuran pameran hantu dunia ini tanpa disedaridi rancang oleh pihak tertentu dalam usaha untuk menghidupkan Count Dracula. Kehidupan abadi yang diinginkan oleh Dracula ini pasti akan menyebabkan keadaan negara menjadi huru-hara. Bagaimanapun, rancangan licik kumpulan ini disedari oleh patung-patung tokoh lama yang mempunyai semangat untuk memastikan rancanga ini gagal. Perak Man, Sultan Melaka, Bendahara Tun Perpatih Putih, Datuk Maharaja Lela bersama siPutum terpaksa berkomunikasi dengan orang luar yang mereka boleh percayai bagi menggagalkan rancangan jahat kumpulan itu.

programme.title: 4 Tahun Tinggal Di Rumah Hantu
programme.desc: 4 Tahun Tinggal di Rumah Hantu adalah film horor Indonesia yang dirilis pada tahun 2014. Film ini merupakan adaptasi sebuah novel berdasarkan kisah nyata yang menceritakan rumah hantu di Kota Depok, Jawa Barat

programme.title: The Hotel
programme.desc: Sarapee dan Pun mewarisi rumah agam pantai daripada Luang Narubal, suami dan dermawan yang mereka khianati dan tinggalkan untuk mati dalam kesedihan. Kedua-duanya kini memutuskan untuk berpindah dan menjadikan rumah agam itu sebagai hotel untuk menjana wang. Dua puluh lima tahun berlalu. Sarapee telah meninggal dunia. Dua anaknya hasil perkahwinannya dengan Pun, Parinya dan Patama, kini sudah dewasa dan mereka pulang dari menetap di luar negara untuk mengambil alih hotel tersebut. Selepas mengubahsuainya, misteri bermula. Kematian berlaku berulang kali, dan kadangkala Parinya dan Pattama menyaksikannya. Tidak lama kemudian mereka adalah satu-satunya orang yang tinggal untuk membongkar misteri dan berjuang untuk terus hidup. Tetapi siapakah pembunuh misteri itu?

programme.title: Gemersik Berbisik Ep 3 Ep3
programme.desc: Kimi, Tasya dan Daniel terkejut melihat Suzana jadi panel. Lebih terkejut apabila wanita itu memperkenalkan diri sebagai Suhana kembar kepada Suzana.

programme.title: MAMA
programme.desc: Kisah bermula pada hari lahir ke-15 Alya (Bella Dowanna) yang disambut setiap tahun bersama mamanya, Aini (Nabila Huda). Setelah kematian suami ketika Alya berusia lapan tahun, Aini berusaha keras setiap hari untuk memberikan kehidupan yang lebih baik untuk untuk anaknya.

programme.title: Takien
programme.desc: Semasa memburu haiwan, Wittaya dan Lokrai secara tidak sengaja menyinggung perasaan Nang Ta-Kian, roh penjaga hutan, yang kemudian membunuh Lokrai. Wittaya terpaksa menjaga anak kawannya, Tong Kam. Sebagai seorang lelaki muda, Tong Kam jatuh cinta dengan anak perempuan Wittaya, Porn tetapi Wittaya lebih suka Trai, seorang jurutera awam yang datang ke kampung mereka untuk menyelaraskan pembinaan empangan. Apabila empangan itu siap, kampung itu banjir dan Wittaya ditugaskan untuk membersihkan setiap pokok, termasuk pokok Ta-Kian yang besar

programme.title: Anak Jantan
programme.desc: Anak Jantan menceritakan kisah Darin yang dihantui oleh kehidupan yang lalu. Gaya hidup negatifnya berubah sama sekali apabila beliau jatuh cinta kepada seorang wanita dari kampungnya bernama Nara. Tidak lama kemudian, pasangan ini berhijrah ke bandar KL untuk memulakan kehidupan baru. Mereka dikurniakan seorang anak lelaki yang bijak bernama Saufi. Malangnya, kebahagiaan keluarga mereka tidak bertahan lama dengan ketibaan Somchai, seorang rakan lama yang kembali menyebabkan pergolakan di tempat kerja Darin.

programme.title: Rumah Pasung
programme.desc: Ryan, Sultan dan Mayang merupakan krew program tv tersebut. Suatu hari Ryan terpaksa menghadiri pengebumian bapa kandungnya. Ibu bapa Ryan membongkar masa lalu Ryan. Ryan anak angkat. Ayah Ryan meninggalkan sebuah rumah untuknya.

programme.title: Arjuna Ep 20 Ep20
programme.desc: Mengisahkan seorang gadis kampung naif yang datang ke bandar untuk mencari pekerjaan di sebuah pejabat dan di situ dia telah bertemu dengan bekas mat rempit yang telah jatuh cinta pada pandangan pertama. Dia berusaha untuk menolong gadis itu sesuaikan diri dengan gaya hidup bandar dan akhirnya gadis kampung itu juga telah jatuh cinta kepadanya. Walaubagaimanapun kerana sifatnya yang matang, ramai wanita mencemburuinya.

programme.title: Morg
programme.desc: Pekerja bilik mayat mula mengalami penampakan yang mengerikan dari kubur, menyesakkan dia dengan penderitaan yang besar kerana rasa bersalah yang perlu dia bayar.

programme.title: Marah - Marah Sayang
programme.desc: Tiga jejaka yang cintakan muzik terpaksa dilepaskan dari kerja masing-masing kerana asyik leka dibuai irama ketika sedang bekerja yang menyebabkan ketidakselesaan orang lain. Rostam, Roslan dan Rosdin mula jatuh cinta terhadap tiga anak dara yang cantik namun Salina, Sarina dan Satina menolak cinta mereka. Pelbagai usaha telah dilakukan oleh mereka dan akhirnya mereka berjaya mengahwini gadis-gadis pilihan mereka itu. Syarat-syarat telah diberi jika ingin berkahwin namun telah dilanggar, ini telah mengakibatkan perkahwinan mereka menjadi kucar-kacir

programme.title: Aku Ada Kau Ada
programme.desc: Nordin Ahmad pelajar tahun kedua sering teringin dipandang cool sentiasa. Namun, setiap kali Nordin menjadi tumpuan, dia akan panik, mula batuk dan akhirnya muntah. Aziz pula, seorang pelajar poyo yang perasan popular, selalu menyakat Nordin. Tina pula pelajar yang baru bertukar ke kolej Nordin untuk 99 Hari Senyum, sebuah program khas untuk mengatasi sikap panas baran yang ditawarkan oleh Dr. Zida, kaunselor.

programme.title: Dendang Remaja
programme.desc: Di sebuah akademi seni, terdapat dua kumpulan pelajar yang berseteru. Mereka tidak serius ketika belajar dan lebih menggemari muzik dari barat. Oleh kerana tidak mendapat bimbingan yang sewajarnya, para pelajar ini menjadi semakin liar sehingga menganggu ketenteraman.

programme.title: Hapuslah Air Matamu
programme.desc: Kisah tentang Aini, seorang penyanyi yang berasal dari kampung yang mula menempah nama selepas menjadi artis rakaman. Bermula sebagai seorang gadis yang sopan dan berbudi pekerti dan turut disokong oleh kekasihnya, Adi sehingga Aini berjaya menjadi penyanyi idaman ramai. Tetapi, Aini mula lupa diri selepas mengecapi kejayaan. Dia kemudiannya diberi peluang berkolaborasi bersama penyanyi terkenal Indonesia, Broery. Setelah itu, Aini menjadi semakin terkenal dan dia mula ditawarkan dengan bayaran yang tinggi untuk persembahannya. Kejayaannya telah mengubah Aini menjadi angkuh dan sombong sehingga dia mula melupakan janji lama dan juga ibunya. Dihina dan dimarahi oleh Aini, ibunya pulang dengan hati yang kecewa lalu jatuh sakit. Dapatkah Aini mengubat luka itu?

programme.title: Mawar Merah
programme.desc: Kartika atau Arti gadis Jakarta yang suka bersosial. Tetapi ibu bapa Kartika tidak suka perangai Kartika yang liar dan suka bersosial. Mereka memutuskan Arti akan dihantar ke Kuala Lumpur untuk dijaga oleh nenek Arti dan bapa saudaranya, Sofyan. Hubungan Arti dan Sofyan semakin rapat dan mereka berdua saling jatuh cinta.Sofyan pula cuba menyembunyikan perasaannya kerana tahu perasaan cintanya terhadap Arti adalah dilarang agama walaupun Arti juga mencintainya. Mereka berdua terpaksa menerima hakikat dan takdir percintaan mereka

programme.title: Tipu Kanan Tipu Kiri
programme.desc: Rudy yang berkahwin dengan selebriti superstar Wulan, mesti merahsiakan perkahwinan mereka kerana klausa dalam kontrak Wulan yang menyatakan dia tidak boleh berkahwin. Dia kemudiannya mendapat pekerjaan di sebuah syarikat dan secara tidak sengaja memberitahu bahawa dia sudah berkahwin. Apabila bosnya ingin berjumpa dengan isterinya, Rudy mengupah seorang wanita berpura-pura menjadi isterinya dan keadaan perlahan-lahan menjadi tidak terkawal.

programme.title: Marah - Marah Sayang
programme.desc: Tiga jejaka yang cintakan muzik terpaksa dilepaskan dari kerja masing-masing kerana asyik leka dibuai irama ketika sedang bekerja yang menyebabkan ketidakselesaan orang lain. Rostam, Roslan dan Rosdin mula jatuh cinta terhadap tiga anak dara yang cantik namun Salina, Sarina dan Satina menolak cinta mereka. Pelbagai usaha telah dilakukan oleh mereka dan akhirnya mereka berjaya mengahwini gadis-gadis pilihan mereka itu. Syarat-syarat telah diberi jika ingin berkahwin namun telah dilanggar, ini telah mengakibatkan perkahwinan mereka menjadi kucar-kacir

programme.title: Kolej 56
programme.desc: Berdepan jurang kefahaman, Rosman harus mencari jalan bagaimana untuk bersama gadis yang dicintainya. Menuntut pelajaran di sebuah kolej swasta, Rosman menjalin persahabatan bersama Roslan, Rosli dan Tengku Kamil. Golongan kelas yang berbeza tidak menghalang mereka untuk bersahabat. Satu kejadian telah menemukan Roslan bersama Mawar. Perasaan cinta mula berputik namun berdepan kesukaran kerana berbeza kepercayaan.

programme.title: Getaran
programme.desc: Awie memiliki sebuah bengkel di sebuah kawasan setinggan. Dalam masa yang sama, di kawasan itu terdapat satu kumpulan muzik yang dianggotai oleh sekumpulan anak muda yang menggelarkan diri mereka kumpulan Kristal. Awie ingin mengetengahkan bakat mereka namun satu insiden telah berlaku ketika dia menjalinkan hubungan dengan Mona yang mengakibatkan dirinya hilang ingatan. Dapatkah Mona memulihkan ingatan Awie dan menyambung perjuangannya bersama kumpulan Kristal?

programme.title: Shakilla
programme.desc: Pasangan penyanyi popular, Ray dan Yasmin mengikat kontrak dengan sebuah hotel terkemuka. Ray sering diganggu peminatnya, Shakila yang tidak pernah bersua muka dengannya. Gangguan Shakila itu memberi ilham kepada Ray untuk menggubah sebuah lagu. Perubahan sikap Ray telah menimbulkan rasa cemburu Yasmin sehingga mendorongnya untuk membunuh Shakila.

programme.title: Gemilang
programme.desc: Julia merupakan seorang penyanyi yang mencapai kejayaan di atas sokongan seorang hartawan bernama Razlan. Rita, teman baik Julia pula merupakan seorang artis terkenal dan menganggap Julia sebagai sumber inspirasinya. Julia merasakan keselamatan dirinya terancam apabila gerak-gerinya sering diawasi oleh seorang lelaki misteri.

programme.title: Bintang Pujaan
programme.desc: Perhubungan cinta antara Rina dan Hassan bersemarak kembali apabila mereka bertemu di kelab malam sehingga membawa ke jinjang pelamin dan mendapat seorang anak. Rina menjadi suri rumahtangga dan meninggalkan pekerjaannya sebagai penyanyi. Kepincangan keluarga dan perubahan hidup berlaku apabila Hassan tercedera dan tidak dapat meneruskan Peterman. Rina kembali ke dunia kelab malam walaupun tidak mendapat restu Hassan dan mula bersikap angkuh dan melupakan tanggungjawabnya.

programme.title: Kami
programme.desc: Dua sahabat keluar mencari rezeki yang lebih baik di bandar melalui pelbagai dugaan kehidupan bersama. Tookoo yang berhasrat ingin menjadi seorang penyanyi lari daripada rumah untuk bebas dari keluarganya. Din pula yang masih budak, sanggup melakukan apa sahaja demi sesuap nasi. Persahabatan yang terjalin makin erat sambil mereka mengharungi liku kehidupan.

programme.title: Kolej 56
programme.desc: Berdepan jurang kefahaman, Rosman harus mencari jalan bagaimana untuk bersama gadis yang dicintainya. Menuntut pelajaran di sebuah kolej swasta, Rosman menjalin persahabatan bersama Roslan, Rosli dan Tengku Kamil. Golongan kelas yang berbeza tidak menghalang mereka untuk bersahabat. Satu kejadian telah menemukan Roslan bersama Mawar. Perasaan cinta mula berputik namun berdepan kesukaran kerana berbeza kepercayaan.

programme.title: Getaran
programme.desc: Awie memiliki sebuah bengkel di sebuah kawasan setinggan. Dalam masa yang sama, di kawasan itu terdapat satu kumpulan muzik yang dianggotai oleh sekumpulan anak muda yang menggelarkan diri mereka kumpulan Kristal. Awie ingin mengetengahkan bakat mereka namun satu insiden telah berlaku ketika dia menjalinkan hubungan dengan Mona yang mengakibatkan dirinya hilang ingatan. Dapatkah Mona memulihkan ingatan Awie dan menyambung perjuangannya bersama kumpulan Kristal?

programme.title: Bintang Pujaan

Rina menjadi suri rumahtangga dan meninggalkan pekerjaannya sebagai penyanyi. Kepincangan keluarga dan perubahan hidup berlaku apabila Hassan tercedera dan tidak dapat meneruskan Peterman. Rina kembali ke dunia kelab malam walaupun tidak mendapat restu Hassan dan mula bersikap angkuh dan melupakan tanggungjawabnya.

programme.title: Gemilang
programme.desc: Julia merupakan seorang penyanyi yang mencapai kejayaan di atas sokongan seorang hartawan bernama Razlan. Rita, teman baik Julia pula merupakan seorang artis terkenal dan menganggap Julia sebagai sumber inspirasinya. Julia merasakan keselamatan dirinya terancam apabila gerak-gerinya sering diawasi oleh seorang lelaki misteri.

programme.title: Kami
programme.desc: Dua sahabat keluar mencari rezeki yang lebih baik di bandar melalui pelbagai dugaan kehidupan bersama. Tookoo yang berhasrat ingin menjadi seorang penyanyi lari daripada rumah untuk bebas dari keluarganya. Din pula yang masih budak, sanggup melakukan apa sahaja demi sesuap nasi. Persahabatan yang terjalin makin erat sambil mereka mengharungi liku kehidupan.

programme.title: Tipu Kanan Tipu Kiri
programme.desc: Rudy yang berkahwin dengan selebriti superstar Wulan, mesti merahsiakan perkahwinan mereka kerana klausa dalam kontrak Wulan yang menyatakan dia tidak boleh berkahwin. Dia kemudiannya mendapat pekerjaan di sebuah syarikat dan secara tidak sengaja memberitahu bahawa dia sudah berkahwin. Apabila bosnya ingin berjumpa dengan isterinya, Rudy mengupah seorang wanita berpura-pura menjadi isterinya dan keadaan perlahan-lahan menjadi tidak terkawal.

programme.title: Mawar Merah
programme.desc: Kartika atau Arti gadis Jakarta yang suka bersosial. Tetapi ibu bapa Kartika tidak suka perangai Kartika yang liar dan suka bersosial. Mereka memutuskan Arti akan dihantar ke Kuala Lumpur untuk dijaga oleh nenek Arti dan bapa saudaranya, Sofyan. Hubungan Arti dan Sofyan semakin rapat dan mereka berdua saling jatuh cinta.Sofyan pula cuba menyembunyikan perasaannya kerana tahu perasaan cintanya terhadap Arti adalah dilarang agama walaupun Arti juga mencintainya. Mereka berdua terpaksa menerima hakikat dan takdir percintaan mereka

programme.title: Aku Ada Kau Ada
programme.desc: Nordin Ahmad pelajar tahun kedua sering teringin dipandang cool sentiasa. Namun, setiap kali Nordin menjadi tumpuan, dia akan panik, mula batuk dan akhirnya muntah. Aziz pula, seorang pelajar poyo yang perasan popular, selalu menyakat Nordin. Tina pula pelajar yang baru bertukar ke kolej Nordin untuk 99 Hari Senyum, sebuah program khas untuk mengatasi sikap panas baran yang ditawarkan oleh Dr. Zida, kaunselor.

programme.title: Hapuslah Air Matamu
programme.desc: Kisah tentang Aini, seorang penyanyi yang berasal dari kampung yang mula menempah nama selepas menjadi artis rakaman. Bermula sebagai seorang gadis yang sopan dan berbudi pekerti dan turut disokong oleh kekasihnya, Adi sehingga Aini berjaya menjadi penyanyi idaman ramai. Tetapi, Aini mula lupa diri selepas mengecapi kejayaan. Dia kemudiannya diberi peluang berkolaborasi bersama penyanyi terkenal Indonesia, Broery. Setelah itu, Aini menjadi semakin terkenal dan dia mula ditawarkan dengan bayaran yang tinggi untuk persembahannya. Kejayaannya telah mengubah Aini menjadi angkuh dan sombong sehingga dia mula melupakan janji lama dan juga ibunya. Dihina dan dimarahi oleh Aini, ibunya pulang dengan hati yang kecewa lalu jatuh sakit. Dapatkah Aini mengubat luka itu?

programme.title: Dendang Remaja
programme.desc: Di sebuah akademi seni, terdapat dua kumpulan pelajar yang berseteru. Mereka tidak serius ketika belajar dan lebih menggemari muzik dari barat. Oleh kerana tidak mendapat bimbingan yang sewajarnya, para pelajar ini menjadi semakin liar sehingga menganggu ketenteraman.

programme.title: Marah - Marah Sayang
programme.desc: Tiga jejaka yang cintakan muzik terpaksa dilepaskan dari kerja masing-masing kerana asyik leka dibuai irama ketika sedang bekerja yang menyebabkan ketidakselesaan orang lain. Rostam, Roslan dan Rosdin mula jatuh cinta terhadap tiga anak dara yang cantik namun Salina, Sarina dan Satina menolak cinta mereka. Pelbagai usaha telah dilakukan oleh mereka dan akhirnya mereka berjaya mengahwini gadis-gadis pilihan mereka itu. Syarat-syarat telah diberi jika ingin berkahwin namun telah dilanggar, ini telah mengakibatkan perkahwinan mereka menjadi kucar-kacir

programme.desc: Pada hari pertama kerja, Ghea terpaksa berjalan dalam hujan sehingga dia akhirnya mengambil payung orang tak dikenali. Ternyata, payung itu milik Rey yang merupakan bos restoran tempat Ghea akan ditemuduga. Sementara itu, kekasih Ghea, Ardan rupanya berselingkuh dengan Geby, kakak Ghea. Rey cuba menenangkan Ghea yang sedih.

programme.title: Karnaval SCTV 33 Ep11
programme.desc: Setiap tahun, karnival SCTV mempunyai tema yang berbeza. Karnival ini menyajikan acara muzik yang paling menarik dan menampilkan ramai musikus serta selebriti terkemuka tanah air.

programme.title: The House
programme.desc: A young couple moves back to their hometown in hopes of starting a family. But when dark memories from their past begin to surface, strange things begin to happen in their house.

programme.title: Don'T Go Too Far
programme.desc: While arguing on the division of their father's 2B inheritance, the eldest brother received a call to realize his son was kidnapped, and the ransom demanded was 2B...

programme.title: Architecture 101
programme.desc: An architect gets an unexpected visit by his first love whom he hasn't seen in many years, bringing back all the memories from when they first met 15 years ago.

programme.title: Ashfall
programme.desc: When a volcano straddling the ChinaNorth Korea border erupts, earthquakes ensue causing pandemonium in both North and South Korea.

programme.title: More Than Family
programme.desc: College student To-il was pregnant for 5 months and decided to marry her younger boyfriend. Her mother and stepfather opposed the decision, she hence set off to find her biological father.

programme.title: Spellbound
programme.desc: Yeo-Ri has the ability to see ghosts. When she joins Jo-Goo's magic show, he offers to help her find a way out before the ghosts can chase him out of her life.

programme.title: Men Of Plastic
programme.desc: A natural-born networker spot potential for business when he met a top plastic surgeon by chance. Together, they decided to open a whole new era of Apgujeong.

programme.title: The Box
programme.desc: A washed-up former hit producer and a young man with stage fear while aspiring to be a singer head off on a road trip filled with music and jamming sessions.

programme.title: One Day
programme.desc: A newly widowed insurance examiner takes on a case involving a woman in a coma. At the hospital, he encounters her spirit and realizes he is the only one that can see her.

programme.title: Cart
programme.desc: As a social critique, Cart tells a story of the employees of a retail supermarket band together when the contract workers are summarily laid off.

programme.title: She's On Duty
programme.desc: In order to catch a gangster, a cop goes undercover as a high school girl to get close to the gangster's daughter.

programme.title: April Snow
programme.desc: A heart-piercing love story between two people, In-su and Seo-young, encountered under unexpected incident that began to shake their serene lives.

programme.title: Don'T Go Too Far
programme.desc: While arguing on the division of their father's 2B inheritance, the eldest brother received a call to realize his son was kidnapped, and the ransom demanded was 2B...

programme.title: The Whistleblower
programme.desc: A disgraced Korean researcher claims to have successfully cloned human embryo stem cells. However, the results were revealed to be fabricated along with other unethical practices later.

programme.title: Soar Into The Sun
programme.desc: An elite combat pilot carries a rescue mission to his missing teammate while facing threats from the north.

programme.title: Secret Zoo
programme.desc: Dreams of landing a permanent position at a top law firm, a lawyer takes on an unusual assignment of keeping an ownerless zoo running by convincing its employees to dress up as animals.

programme.title: 200 Pounds Beauty
programme.desc: A timid, overweight and under-appreciated back-up singer resorts to drastic "head-to-toe" plastic surgery to become a pop diva.

programme.title: A Year-End Medley
programme.desc: From awkward first love to crush on a friend and long forgotten love, 14 love-struck individuals are brought together at Hotel Emross on New Years Eve.

programme.title: The Wild
programme.desc: Woo-chul is released early for good behavior after 8 years in jail. His friend Do-sik invites him to join the gang but he wants to live an honest life. Can Woo-chul keep his hands clean?

programme.title: Along With The Gods: The Last 49 Days
programme.desc: The three grim reapers will guide their 49th soul Kim Soo-Hong to the underworld trials. Meanwhile, God of House will recover the grim reapers' memories from 1,000 years ago.

programme.title: The Tower
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve at an ultra-luxurious building complex, a White Christmas party is held to dazzle its equally high-end tenants and VIP guests. It takes a horrific turn when a fire breaks out.

programme.title: More Than Family
programme.desc: College student To-il was pregnant for 5 months and decided to marry her younger boyfriend. Her mother and stepfather opposed the decision, she hence set off to find her biological father.

programme.title: Meet The In-Laws
programme.desc: Hyun Joon and his girlfriend Da Hong are ready to tie the knot, but there's one big problem: Da Hong's father is strongly against him because of his hometown. Will they ever make it to the altar?

programme.title: The Spies
programme.desc: Kim, a North Korean spy who had lived in South Korea for 22 years is suddenly contacted by his superior. His team plans to complete an earlier mission and steal the target's large stockpile of cash.

programme.title: Cart
programme.desc: As a social critique, Cart tells a story of the employees of a retail supermarket band together when the contract workers are summarily laid off.

programme.title: Herb
programme.desc: A 20-year-old woman with mild mental disorder falls in love with a policeman but must face heartbreak when she is forced to deal with certain realities about herself and those around her.

programme.title: My Sassy Girl
programme.desc: A young man sees a drunk, cute woman standing too close to the tracks at a metro station in Seoul and pulls her back. She ends up getting him into trouble repeatedly after that, starting on the train.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep14
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep4835
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3785
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. programme.title: Blessing of Formosa (T) Ep199
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep2
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Way to Health (M) Ep271272
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about ones health.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep490
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Home Sweet Home (M) Ep3233
programme.desc: Every one of them showed up in this house with some sort of lacking until they've met Mommy Hsiao-Li. Although they are not biologicap related, they Stay with each other like a real family.

programme.title: I Still Remember
programme.desc: Chi is a property agent who leads an aimless and unfulfilling life until he reunites with his P.E. teacher, Wong, from primary school. Despite his illness, Wong insists on keeping his promise of completing a 10K marathon to his late wife. Inspired by Wong, Chi brings himself to his feet and finds the courage to cheer himself on!

programme.title: I Love You, You're Perfect, Now Change!
programme.desc: Catch this comedy-musical adapted from the Broadway classic I LOVE YOU, YOURE PERFECT, NOW CHANGE consisting of 12 independent stories from the viewpoints of individuals, families and societies all exploring the timeless theme of love!

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: As the police sets to arrest a drug lord, a team of masked thugs steals the drugs and murders the cops. Inspector Bong is devastated to see the aftermath of the carnage and soon discovers that the killers are led by Ngo, a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him. As the two men meet again, it is time to settle the score

programme.title: Divergence
programme.desc: Three men are going beyond what their jobs require them to do. An ill-fated police detective runs into a woman during his investigation on a money laundering case, a lawyer protects a corrupt businessman from law and a ruthless killer violates his code to get involved in a police investigation. These three men are thrown together by circumstance...

programme.title: Europe Raiders
programme.desc: Mr Lin and Miss Wang are the two top bounty hunters in the business, and are searching for the destructive missile Hand of God to prove who is the better bounty hunter. They soon realize they are not the only ones after the missile. Will Lin and Wang put their differences aside and work together in search for the Hand of God?

programme.title: Eternal Wave
programme.desc: Lin Xiang is a spy trying to rebuild an underground informant network in Shanghai after the Japanese Occupation. He meets a simple but righteous girl who acts as his wife in the secret mission. When Lin is captured after his identity was revealed, his wife comes to save him but can they escape from the foes?

programme.title: Secret Diary of a Mom To Be, The
programme.desc: A high-flying PR manager and her loving husband swear by a childless lifestyle but she is shocked to learn that she is expecting just when things look bright for a promotion! How would they deal with the unexpected surprises that life throws in their way?

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Ting is an undercover police who infiltrates a triad and Tuen is a triad mole being planted into the police force. While Tang is tired of being an undercover cop, Tuen wishes to quit the triad and become a real police. When the triad boss sets a trap to uncover the moles' identity, the two must fight for themselves.

programme.title: Hello Stranger
programme.desc: This is a Thai romantic comedy. The story portrays a young Thai man and woman who meet by coincidence while on vacation in South Korea. They decide to tour the country together while keeping their names a secret from each other. From unwillingly at first, then become best friends and fall in love finally.

programme.title: Over My Dead Body
programme.desc: This dark comedy begins with an unidentified corpse appearing at the doorstep of a residential flat. Fearing that the corpse will turn their flats into "haunted flats", which will cause a drastic drop in the property value, the four families living on the same floor attempt to move the corpse away, embroiling themselves in chaos.

programme.title: Social Distancing
programme.desc: Cherry is a young girl addicted to the internet. After seeing a warning video about an e-ghost on YouTube, she begins to encounter many mysterious incidents, and the e-ghost also takes control of her family. Cherry must face her unbearable past in order to get out of this horrifying paranormal world...

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: Echoes of the Rainbow
programme.desc: Set in Hong Kong in the 1960s, the story revolves around the family of a hardworking shoemaker Mr Law, with his happy-go-lucky wife and two sons a talented elder son and an eight-year-old eccentric younger son. While their lives are not always smooth-sailing, the family sticks together and support one another through thick and thin.

programme.title: My Kickass Wife
programme.desc: Jade is a beautiful royal guard who is set up for marriage by the Queen in order to avoid the King setting eyes on her. Jade falls for Sean and helps him win the contest for her. After the wedding, Sean discovers her bad temper and visits a brothel in his despair. He meets and is attracted to a girl there, not knowing she has a secret agenda...

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as "Magic Hands" Ken, a legendary gambling maestro who is forced out of retirement when his daughter's safety is compromised by an international gambling mafia. In order to save her, Ken and his new protg Cool must work together to expose the evil mastermind by challenging him to a high stakes head-to-head battle of cards.

programme.title: Ashes of Time Redux
programme.desc: After his beloved woman married his brother, Ou Yang Feng moves to the desert to run an inn and becomes a killer agent. He makes acquaintance of different people with their different stories ... The movie is the winner of the 1st Hong Kong Film Critics Society Awards for Best Film, Best Director, Best Screenplay and Best Actor (Leslie Cheung).

programme.title: The Invisible Guest
programme.desc: Young and beautiful entrepreneur Joanna is a prime suspect in a locked-room murder where her lover is found dead. She pays off a police officer to prove her innocence. During the investigation, they discover another murder case involving Joanna and her lover, and eventually reveals the truth.

programme.title: Kung Fu Monster
programme.desc: In the Ming Dynasty, the Bruneian Empire offers a monster as a gift to the nation. Imperial guard Ocean is tasked to train it, but realizing it is a kind creature by nature, he releases it secretly so that it will not become a killing beast. His action prompts a frenzy hunt for the monster when the palace puts a hefty bounty for its return

programme.title: You are the One
programme.desc: A talented rogue trader experiences a 180-degree change in life when he encounters a girl who does not believe good things will happen to her. Will they fall in love? It seems like a Cinderellas adventure has just begun!

programme.title: High Voltage
programme.desc: A Hong Kong cop is assigned to escort an important witness from the Philippines, only to find himself teaming up with a local cop to bring down a wicked crime syndicate.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, Zhang Wu Ji successfully rescued the Six Major sects at Dadu. Nevertheless, the quest for the Dragon Sabre continues as Wu Ji and his three girlfriends set sail for Ice Fire Island. After a series of vicious fights, they finally unveil the secret behind the Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre.

programme.title: My Blue Summer
programme.desc: Zhi has been secretly in love with Nan since she met him once as a child. After graduating high school, Zhi realizes that she and Nan are in the same university, where they get to know each other by chance and become close friends. However, Zhi is still too shy to express her love for Nan. Will this long-term crush finally turn into true love?

programme.title: Love · Revolution
programme.desc: Ai Yoshida will do anything for love, including traveling to Thailand with her boyfriend from Japan to run dope. When her boyfriend is kidnapped by the local gangster after a brawl at a bar, Ai sets out on a rescue mission that sends her on an action-packed roller-coaster ride where she meets a professional assassin who breaks out of jail for love.

programme.title: Dream Lover
programme.desc: Ka Shing meets Kitty one day and they fall quickly in love. However, Kitty disappears shortly and when they meet years later, she is already married. To comfort himself, Ka Shing asks a mystic master to let Kitty appear in his dreams so that he can be with her constantly, even though she can only be his dream lover...

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Gambler
programme.desc: Manfred and Flora are gambling addicts who have come across each other a few times at the casino, but do not leave impression on each other until they both suffer heavy losses and are held hostage by the loan sharks in Macau. They find themselves falling in love, and decide to get married when they come back to Hong Kong.

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: When a decade-long tunnel project is about to complete, an earthquake strikes and leads to a series of subsidence and landslides. The tunnel and a nearby town are at stake. A retired soldier and his son step up to try and stop the disasters at source. Will the authority decide to blow up the tunnel to save the 160,000 people in town?

programme.title: Death Notice
programme.desc: A serial killer leaves death notices in a city, stating when, how and who he will murder. Even if the victims report it to the police and receive protection, the killer can still break through and execute them. While the police sets up a special task force in response, they expose an even bigger conspiracy behind.

programme.title: The Calling of a Bus Driver
programme.desc: A girl named Suki fulfills her dream of being a bus driver after breaking up with her boyfriend, who has an affair with her good friend. When Suki is invited to attend her ex-boyfriends wedding, she is presented with a chance for revenge will she take it and turn her life around?

programme.title: Legendary Amazons
programme.desc: Produced by Jackie Chan, this is the story about the fabled Yang family of female generals in feudal China. Yang Zong Bao, the last man standing in the Yang family, dies in a battle when defending the Song Dynasty from invaders. Zong Baos wife Mu Gui Ying steps up to lead other widows of the Yangs into battle to continue their husbands legacy.

programme.title: The Italian Recipe
programme.desc: Famous pop idol Peng travels to Rome for a reality show and encounters an ordinary girl, Mang, who dreams of becoming a great chef after migrating to Italy. Peng and Mang have nothing in common but spend a magical night in Rome together. Their lives begin to change as the two start to fall in love.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: Wu Dang Sects Zhang Chui Shans son, Zhang Wu Ji, finds himself accidentally embroiled in the fight for the Dragon Sabre. When he unwittingly learns the powerful martial arts skills from the Jiuyin scriptures, Wu Ji proceeds to help the Six Major sects fight against the corrupt government.

programme.title: Flashover
programme.desc: This is based on a true story. A sudden earthquake hits the gas pipes in an industrial park, triggering massive explosions and engulfing the neighboring area in flames. When the Fire Rescue Force reaches the scene, firefighters must fight against the flames and time, as they commit to safeguard lives with their own.

programme.title: Return of Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A band of ninjas slaughters the entire Wu Dang Clan and frames Du Gu Wu Di, chief of the Invincible Clan, for the deed. Yun masters the silkworm martial arts style and decides to take revenge for the Clan by challenging Wu Di, but is defeated and seriously hurt. Luckily, Master Li saves and treats him, allowing Yun to avoid the ninjas pursuit.

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: Life Gamble
programme.desc: Martial arts master Yu has retired for years but is invited to join force with another master Tao to fight against the four famous thieves and retrieve the stolen Dragon Jade. However, Taos real plan is to possess the treasure himself and kills Yu after he defeats the thieves...

programme.title: The Adventures of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his peoples livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: Shaolin Abbot
programme.desc: Monk Chi San is sent by his Shaolin Master to learn a special kung fu from a Wu Dang priest. He gets embroiled in the fight between the Qing and Ming camps and has to gather disciples to rebuild the burnt Shaolin temple at the same time.

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: Singer Qing Qing and architect Tang Peng Nan are a sweet couple. Qing Qing sacrifices herself to help Peng Nan at a time when his family is going through difficulties and is misunderstood by Peng Nan, leading to their break up. When Peng Nan learns the truth and decides to make up with Qing Qing, he found that she is suffering from a terminal illness.

programme.title: Clans of Intrigue
programme.desc: Heroic outlaw Chu Liu Xiang is dining with his friend Monk Wu Hua, when Gong from the Holy Water Palace appears and accuses Chu of stealing the holy water from her Palace and using it for various murders. Chu denies, and is given a month to find the murderer or be killed by Gong. To prove his innocence, Chu decides to investigate the case

programme.title: The Land of Many Perfumes
programme.desc: Monk Tang San Zang, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing find themselves in Womanland, where women give birth to baby girls by drinking the magical spring water.

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: Threatened by the Yuan who are closing in to rule the whole of China, a band of Song survivors band together to save their prime minister. This bold and fearless heroes fighting for their cause are led by international star, Lo Lieh (Glass Tears, Killer Clans) and Shi Szu (Lovers Destiny), who must fight their way out of trap after trap. But they can't escape them all, and eventually the two end up in prison... it is either death or a fight to the end!

programme.title: Illicit Desire
programme.desc: This instant cult classic adapts three erotic and mystical tales from the Chinese classical works, with stories spanning across time from the Tang to Ming dynasties. The stories, filled with characters such as emperors, concubines, monks and fortune-tellers, intertwine in a world of adultery, lust and greed, alongside great costumes!

programme.title: The Champion
programme.desc: After years in prison, Lu Hu returns home to find himself set up by his ruthless brother Piao, who has taken over the family coal mine business and imprisoned their sister. Hu takes down Piao and saves his sister but their coal mine falls into the hands of a Japanese gang, which Hu and his sister must fight in order to get it back.

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: Mr. Funnybone Strikes Again
programme.desc: In this hilarious sequel, Mr Big Potato opens an old-fashioned Chinese clinic, but his traditional methods are rejected by the sceptics of modern Hong Kong. Enter his buddy Mr Funny bone to rescue his business!

programme.title: Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Wei Chun is a cocky young man sentenced to jail for killing a man in a fight. One day, Wei Chun picks a fight with a seemingly defenseless old man who completely thrashes him! The old man turns out to be the master of monkey style kung fu and as they become friends, he gives Wei Chun half of a medallion that would direct him to hidden secrets.

programme.title: Forever And Ever
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po plays a young scholar who is manipulated into marrying a nobleman's reluctant daughter. After marrying, he soon discovers the reason for her hesitation. She is stricken with a contagious disease. But, with the power of true love, their romance prevails.

programme.title: My Young Auntie
programme.desc: An elderly landowner marries young Dai Nan to keep his inheritance away from his unscrupulous nephew before he dies. When Dai Nan brings along the deed to meet his other nephew, a series of amusing incidents happen with this young auntie, the nephew and his son. Kara Hui won Best Actress in the first Hong Kong Film Awards for her role as Dai Nan.

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: This is a coming-of-age tale depicting the lower class Hong Kong troubled youths in the 1960s and the societal issues that they face. Wang Chung is a hotheaded and rebellious teen who is tempted by the dark side, and have to unfortunately pay a huge price for it.

programme.title: Duel For Gold
programme.desc: Six swordsmen, including two sisters and their husbands, a ranger and a security man, are trying to steal a million gold taels from the Fu Lai Treasury House, not knowing that one of them is actually an undercover hero. In their quest, they have to double-cross and outwit one another...

programme.title: The Human Goddess
programme.desc: This is a love story between an alluring fairy, Seventh Sister, who comes down from heaven to experience life in 70s Hong Kong, and a man who is running a debt laden orphanage. A heartless tycoon plans to take over the orphanage for its land but has to deal with Seventh Sisters magical powers as she aims to protect it from falling into his hands!

programme.title: The Black Butterfly
programme.desc: Kwan leads a double life as a waitress and as an infamous outlaw skilled in martial arts, The Black Butterfly. When she steals a cache of gold from the Five Devils Rock bandits, she soon has the bandits, and the government, on her tail.

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demons clutches.

programme.title: Secret Service of the Imperial Court
programme.desc: Zhao Bu Fan is the sergeant of the governments secret police. Wang is a cruel and ruthless eunuch who takes over the Emperors ruling power and leads the team of secret agents. After witnessing the atrocities committed by Eunuch Wang, Sergeant Zhao decides to defect but ends up being hunted by his friends, comrades and even his father.

programme.title: Moods Of Love
programme.desc: This Song Dynasty period piece about how far one would go for love (or lust) has two tales. The first involves a devilish magistrate who tries to tempt a Buddhist monk out of his self-professed celibacy by hiring a pretty prostitute. The second is the tragic tale of an exploited young girl who is forced to work in an unscrupulous couples brothel.

programme.title: Clan Of The White Lotus
programme.desc: The head of White Lotus Clan, Lo, is a highly skilled martial artist who supports the Qing government and helps destroy the rebellion group. Hung from Shaolin who kills Los brother, is being hunted and hides in another rebel Hus house. The clan attacks at night killing Hu and his sister, but Hung manages to get Hus pregnant wife to safety.

programme.title: Little Hero
programme.desc: An orphan, Little Bastard is taken on and trained as a fighter by a hermit. When Little Bastard grows up, he feels he is old enough to go out and look for his parents. Luckily for him, he befriends a beggar, Hsiao Yi, who being street-wise, manages to help him find his family, but somehow gets into trouble with the gang.

programme.title: Four Riders
programme.desc: Four martial arts experts live in Seoul after the Korean War in the 1950s. One of them inexplicably crosses path with a drug trafficking syndicate, and his three friends have no choice but to fight a brutal battle on his side...

programme.title: Heroes Two
programme.desc: Shaolin disciple Hung escapes from the burning temple after it is attacked by the Qing army and is badly wounded. He is handed over to the Qing soldiers by Fang as he mistakes Hung for a bandit. When Fang realizes his mistakes, he tries all ways to help Hung escape so that they can team up to fight the Qing army together.

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the most widely read and filmed novel in Chinese history, this sumptuous version was said to be the most successful one. Loh Tihs looks, demeanour and aura in her portrayal of Lin Dai Yu has won her the epithet "Classic Beauty".

programme.title: The Gambling Syndicate
programme.desc: A young provincial detective seeks to take down a local gambling syndicate with the help of two convicts.

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: In this musical drama, Hsiu Hsiu, a beautiful shepherd girl, falls in love with a handsome boatman Ta Lung. However, she cannot afford to marry him because of her fathers towering debt from gambling. To complicate the matter, a rival suitor promises to pay off all her father's debts on one condition: that Hsiu Hsiu marries him...

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: Hsieh Choun, the Black Dragon, is in trouble with the police since Wang Sien Tien's gang is helping them; he is no longer free to conduct his drugs shipments out of the port freely as he used to. He buys more thugs and killers to dispose of the young upstart, and soon Wang is in dire straits, in the port of Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Blue and the Black Part 2
programme.desc: Continuing from the first movie, Tang Qi ends her career as a nightclub singer and starts searching battle-scarred China for her lover Chang, who is now entangled with Japanese invaders, communist insurgents, and a warlord's beautiful daughter.

programme.title: Heroes of the East
programme.desc: A Chinese man marries a Japanese woman through an arranged marriage and manages to insult all of her Japanese martial arts family by issuing a challenge to her that is misinterpreted by the others. He must then prove how good Chinese Kung Fu really is through a series of duels with the seven Japanese martial artists who come to meet the challenge!

programme.title: Passing Flickers
programme.desc: This film is an amusing insiders look at the Hong Kong film industry and is based on Director Li Han Hsiangs popular newspaper column recounting his work at Shaw Brothers. The collection of some of his funniest and most surreal film musings of the era, filled with behind-the-scene asides, this is a must-see for any Hong Kong cinema aficionado!

programme.title: Flying Guillotine 2
programme.desc: In a time of anti-Manchu sentiment, Emperor Yong Zheng employs his ruthless Blood Hound Corps to silence any dissenters. Only one man and his signature weapon, The Flying Guillotine, stand in their way.

programme.title: Jonah Hex
programme.desc: Oscar nominee Josh Brolin plays Jonah Hex, a scarred drifter and bounty hunter who can track down anyone...and anything. Having survived death, Jonah's violent history is steeped in myth and legend - leaving him with one foot in the natural world and one on the "other side." His only human connection is with Lilah (Transformers' Megan Fox), whose life in a brothel has left her with scars of her own. But Jonah's past is about to catch up with him when the U.S. military makes him an offer he can't refuse: in exchange for his freedom, he must track down and stop the dangerous terrorist Quentin Turnbull (Oscar nominee John Malkovich). But Turnbull, who is gathering an army and preparing to unleash Hell, is also Jonah's oldest enemy and will stop at nothing until Jonah is dead. Based on the legendary graphic novel, this epic adventure thriller gives a new face to the comic book genre by combining the Western genre with supernatural elements.

programme.desc: After breaking up with her perfect-on-paper boyfriend, Sadie is swept off her feet by the rebellious bad boy Gavin. But soon, she discovers dating a bad boy isnt just exciting... its dangerous.

programme.title: Wolf
programme.desc: A mild-mannered book editor (Jack Nicholson) bitten by a wolf goes for the throat of all who have betrayed him. Michelle Pfeiffer co-stars.

programme.title: Deadly Dormitory
programme.desc: When a University student refuses to sleep with her professor in exchange for good grades, shes in danger of being killed to keep her quiet, and her mother must drop everything to save her.

programme.title: Sahara
programme.desc: Master explorer Dirk Pitt goes on the adventure of a lifetime of seeking out a lost Civil War battleship known as the "Ship of Death" in the deserts of West Africa while helping a WHO doctor being hounded by a ruthless dictator.

programme.title: Ali
programme.desc: The life story of heavyweight boxing champion Muhammad Ali, following the champ's early days as Cassius Clay and his rise in sports and politics, including his controversial refusal to fight in the Vietnam War and his infamous comeback battles.

programme.title: Super Eruption
programme.desc: Super Eruption is a non-stop thrill ride - the story of two people who come together to put a stop to one of the greatest natural disasters to ever threaten humanity

programme.title: Blue Streak
programme.desc: A convicted thief poses as a cop in order to retrieve a stolen diamond.

programme.title: After Earth
programme.desc: A crash landing leaves teenager Kitai Raige (Jaden Smith) and his legendary father Cypher (Will Smith) stranded on Earth, 1,000 years after cataclysmic events forced humanitys escape.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Into The Spider-Verse
programme.desc: Enter a universe where more than one wears the mask.

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Chappie tells the story of a robot imbued with artificial intelligence who is stolen by two local gangsters who want to use him for their own nefarious purposes.

programme.title: Stanley Tucci: Searching for Italy S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Liguria - Stanley Tucci visits one of the most famous and frequented regions of Italy, the Italian Riviera, for the glamour of Portofino and the stunning picture-perfect fishing villages of the Cinque Terre.

programme.title: Food Factory S2 Ep17
programme.desc: Discover how the makers of doubly delicious 'Tortetufo' get one chocolate praline mousse cake inside another; plain chick peas are transformed into yummy boondi, a spicy, crunchy Indian snack; sinfully tender, frosted sugar cookies come out of the oven a technicolor treat.

programme.title: Food Factory S2 Ep18
programme.desc: Discover how Amy's Kitchen wraps up their scrumptious rice and pinto bean burritos; an Oregon-based company adds a double shot of bacon to lip smacking fried rice that never meets the fryer; sweet little Maraschino cherries get their signature colour.

programme.title: Arctic Drift: A Year in the Ice S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The team endures through the extremes of Arctic winter close to the North Pole. Through the 24-hour darkness they work to revolutionise our ability to monitor sea ice using satellites, and they explore how the melting ice is releasing its own damaging greenhouse gases.

programme.title: Michael Palin - Into Iraq S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Michael Palin embarks on a 1000 mile adventure into Iraq, a country he has never been to before. programme.desc: A look at one of the largest cereal factories in the world and one of the most important products in the modern age. Plus how do you reproduce music for the elite film industry and how does America compete with foreign competition in the battle for the best flatware.

programme.title: Earth from Space S1 Ep1
programme.desc: A New Perspective - Cameras in space capture natural spectacles on an epic scale.

programme.title: Extinction - The Facts
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough and a cast of world leading scientists bring us the facts behind the current extinction crisis. Revealing what extinction is, what is happening now, why it is happening and what could happen in the future.

programme.title: Climate Change - The Facts
programme.desc: After one of the hottest years on record, Sir David Attenborough looks at the science of climate change and potential solutions to this global threat.

programme.title: Climate Change: Ade On The Frontline S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Solomon Islands and Australia - Ade sees the damage that climate change is causing, and finds out how we can fight it - and whether eating sea urchin gonads will help.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 1 - Bolivia Ep3
programme.desc: A rugged, sky-high plain in the remote heart of Bolivia, the Andean Altiplano lays claim to towering snow-capped peaks, glowing multicoloured lagoons, and the worlds largest salt desert. One of the worlds most pristine wilderness frontiers, the Altiplano is also a high-altitude haven for rare Andean wildlife.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Hollywoods Held Hostage Ep5
programme.desc: During the last few weeks of the dry season, the prides stick close to the only available water in the river. But in Luangwa, that proximity spells danger - especially when the scent of a hippo kill compels the Hollywoods to cross the river.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - Praying for Rain Ep3
programme.desc: Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenixs search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild 3 - Mission Black Rhino Ep1
programme.desc: Its a critical time for two black rhinos in Zambia. Four year old female Apson and fourteen year old bull Kango are at the core of a complex relocation mission thats part of a grand plan to save a species.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild 3 - Carnivore Rescue Ep2
programme.desc: Deep in Kafue National Park, the largest and wildest protected area in Zambia, a team of biologists and vets from the Zambian Carnivore Programme (ZCP) races against time to save and protect Africas apex predators.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Tides Ep4
programme.desc: Follow the ebb and flow of the tides. Over a hundred thousand sandpipers migrating from the Arctic to South America make a pit stop along the Bay of Fundy. On the other side of Nova Scotia, the rocky-coastline provides a home for harbor and grey seals.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - Tsiba's New Mum Ep4
programme.desc: Tackle an emergency when Dr. Amanda removes a sable antelopes tracking collar, and see the animal-care team help a flea-riddled baby vervet monkey find a new mom. Free two orphaned serval cats and follow 20 yellow baboons into their new enclosure.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 - Defenders of the Reef Ep4
programme.desc: Its summer in the Gulf of Oman. The scorching Arabian sun heats the shallow waters to 86 degrees boosting the growth of algae across a vast coral reef. This attracts thousands of hungry herbivores creating a fish versus fish turf war.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 1 - Chile Ep2
programme.desc: Stretching more than 1,000 kilometers west of the Andes Mountains, the Atacama Desert is the worlds driest non-polar region. Here are ominous volcanoes, dramatic erupting geysers, and dazzling colonies of flamingos. And, because of its high altitude and lack of light pollution, Atacama is home to the worlds largest astronomical observatory.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 1 - Bolivia Ep3
programme.desc: A rugged, sky-high plain in the remote heart of Bolivia, the Andean Altiplano lays claim to towering snow-capped peaks, glowing multicoloured lagoons, and the worlds largest salt desert. One of the worlds most pristine wilderness frontiers, the Altiplano is also a high-altitude haven for rare Andean wildlife.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 - Chemical Weapons Ep1
programme.desc: Keep your distance from these natural-born killers. Armed with venom and other poisonous tools that make hunting easier (and escape impossible), nudibranches, cuttlefish, giant centipedes, and assassin bugs are all dressed to kill.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 1 - Chile Ep2
programme.desc: Stretching more than 1,000 kilometers west of the Andes Mountains, the Atacama Desert is the worlds driest non-polar region. programme.desc: Deep in Kafue National Park, the largest and wildest protected area in Zambia, a team of biologists and vets from the Zambian Carnivore Programme (ZCP) races against time to save and protect Africas apex predators.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Pollinators Ep5
programme.desc: The Annapolis Valley is the Wild Wild Easts most important agricultural center. We dive into the hive to explore the complex social structures of hardworking honeybees. The Monarch butterfly has traveled all the way from Mexico to feed off the local milkweed.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 - Strange Powers Ep2
programme.desc: Examine the lives of creatures with really strange skills. From poison-shooting arachnids to ink-bombing octopuses to bifocal-eyed beetles, these animals use their powers to help them defeat predators and ensure their survival.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - A Pangolin's Plight Ep5
programme.desc: Feel heartbreak when Dr. Amandas team loses a pangolin abused by wildlife traffickers, but cheer when another is released post-rehab. Check on a trio of hedgehogs and tag along as the centers baboons and nyala antelopes get a change of scenery.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 - A Turtle's Legacy Ep5
programme.desc: The sea turtle is one of the oldest animals on earth. These ancient mariners even pre-date the dinosaurs. They have existed, relatively unchanged, for over 100 million years. But now, all seven of the surviving species are endangered.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Next Dynasty Ep6
programme.desc: The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - The Inside Story Ep4
programme.desc: Look behind the scenes and meet the innovative teams working to preserve and protect Kenyas wildlife. Check out Save the Elephants radio-tracking-collar system, a drone that monitors wild dog packs, and a local team of Maasai cheetah trackers.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild 3 - Mission Black Rhino Ep1
